title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 227.3 - Amount of Coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 227.3 - Amount of Coverage

State Regulations

An insurer shall not issue force-placed insurance in excess of the borrower's last known amount of hazard insurance; provided, however, that if the amount of the borrower's last known hazard insurance did not comply with the mortgage loan requirements, then the insurer shall not issue force-placed insurance in excess of the replacement cost of the improvements on the mortgaged property. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 11

227.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
